campaigns.title: MLBB Savage Compilation - December 2025
campaigns.description: Cari klip savage terkeren dari stream saya minggu ini. Harus ada watermark GamerPro! Fokus pada gameplay Lancelot, Fanny, dan Gusion. Durasi optimal 30-60 detik.

campaigns.title: Skincare Routine Highlights - Glow Up Challenge
campaigns.description: Potong bagian terbaik dari video skincare routine saya jadi TikTok pendek. Fokus pada before-after transformation dan product showcase. Caption harus include hashtag #GlowUpWithGrace

campaigns.title: Funny Fail Moments - Exclusive Clippers Only
campaigns.description: Private campaign for selected top clippers. Compile my funniest fail moments into viral clips. Don't share content outside! Premium rates for quality work.

campaigns.title: Cooking Tutorial Best Moments
campaigns.description: Kompilasi momen terbaik dari cooking tutorial saya. Fokus pada tips memasak cepat dan plating cantik.

campaigns.title: New Year Gaming Marathon Highlights
campaigns.description: Draft campaign untuk event gaming marathon tahun baru. Akan ada banyak momen epic yang bisa di-clip.

campaigns.title: Valorant Clutch Moments
campaigns.description: Koleksi momen clutch terbaik dari ranked games Valorant. Campaign paused karena ada revisi content guidelines.
campaigns.pauseReason: Revising content guidelines - will resume after new year

campaigns.title: Black Friday Special Clips
campaigns.description: Campaign untuk Black Friday sale - sudah selesai dan budget habis.

submissions.title: Lancelot Perfect Execution - Triple Kill Savage
submissions.adminNotes: Great editing quality and perfect gameplay capture

submissions.title: Bad Quality Video Test
submissions.rejectionReason: Video resolution too low (below 720p minimum). Please resubmit with higher quality.

submissions.title: No Watermark Clip
submissions.rejectionReason: Missing required watermark 'GamerPro' as specified in campaign rules.

submissions.title: Wrong Aspect Ratio
submissions.rejectionReason: Video aspect ratio must be 9:16 for TikTok. Current ratio appears to be 16:9.

submissions.title: Suspicious View Count
submissions.flagReason: Unusual view spike detected - possible bot activity. Under investigation.

influencerProfiles.bio: Professional MLBB player and content creator. 2x SEA Games medalist.
Your daily dose of skincare tips, makeup tutorials, and self-care motivation.
New streamer looking to grow with ClipFlow. Daily streams on MLBB and Valorant.
